languages.text: "Утверждение ложно! Фиксирую скверну в данной единице, идентичную окружающей нас. Фиксирую нарушение протокола чистоты, требующего направить корабль в сердце ближайшей звезды ради очистительной аннигиляции. Фиксирую предательство священных духов машин, доверенных попечению маловерных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кажется, что даже пощелкивание и шепот помех из вокса Техножреца приобретают сердитую интонацию.{/n} "Ты не ведаешь, что говоришь, собрат! Скверна уже в тебе, везде вокруг. Вы допустили ее в свои системы, позволили возобладать. Вам стоило направить корабль в сердце ближайшей звезды и дать огню пожрать его и вас! Лучше дать погибнуть этой прекрасной машине и всем ее духам, чем превратить ее в орудие скверны".

languages.text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно! Фиксирую скверну в данной единице, идентичную окружающей нас. Фиксирую нарушение протокола чистоты, требующего направить корабль в сердце ближайшей звезды ради очистительной аннигиляции. Фиксирую предательство священных духов машин, доверенных попечению маловерных".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

{n}Even the crackling and the whispering noise of the Tech-Priest's vox sound furious somehow.{/n} "Brother, you know not what you are doing! The corruption is already within you and everywhere around you. You let it into your systems, you allowed it to get the better of you. You should have steered your ship toward the heart of the nearest star and let the fire devour you along with the taint! Better to let this beautiful machine and all of its spirits die than to turn it into a weapon of corruption."

"This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

{n}Even the crackling and the whispering static of the Tech-Priest's vox became furious.{/n} "Your claim is false! I am reading the corruption in you just like everywhere else. Protocol dictates you should have steered your ship toward the heart of the nearest star and let the cleansing fires devour you along with this taint! This ship was placed in your charge and you have forsaken your duty."

{n}Even the crackling and the whispering static of the Tech-Priest's vox became furious.{/n} "Your claim is false! I am reading the corruption in you just like everywhere else. Protocol dictates you should have steered your ship toward the heart of the nearest star and let the cleansing fires devour you along with this taint! This ship was placed in your charge and you have forsaken your duty."

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的！我在这个单位身上检测到了与周围环境完全相同的腐化。检测到违背净化协议的恶行。净化协议要求将飞船驶入最近的恒星核心处，以达到在毁灭中获得净化的目的！我检测到那些信仰薄弱之人，背叛了他们应当看护的神圣机魂！”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的！我在这个单位身上检测到了与周围环境完全相同的腐化。我检测到了对净化协议的违背。净化协议要求将飞船驶入最近的恒星核心处，以达到在毁灭中获得净化的目的！我检测到那些信仰薄弱之人，背叛了他们应当看护的神圣机魂！”

languages.text: «¡Esa declaración es falsa! Detecto corrupción en esta unidad igual a la que nos rodea. ¡Detecto una infracción del protocolo de purificación, que ordena que la nave se dirija al corazón de la estrella más cercana para purificarla mediante su aniquilación! ¡Detecto una traición a los sagrados espíritus máquina encomendados a gente cuya fe fue débil».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

traits.locale_text: «¡Esa declaración es falsa! Detecto corrupción en esta unidad igual a la que nos rodea. ¡Detecto una infracción del protocolo de purificación, que ordena que la nave se dirija al corazón de la estrella más cercana para purificarla mediante su aniquilación! ¡Detecto una traición a los sagrados espíritus máquina encomendados a gente cuya fe fue débil».

languages.text: 「その言い分は間違いです！自分々を取り囲むものと同じこのユニットの中にある腐敗を登録する。殲滅の浄化目的で、近隣惑星の中心に船を導いた浄化プロトコルの違反行為も！信仰心に負けやすい者達を任された、神聖なる機械精霊の裏切り行為もだ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

traits.locale_text: 「その言い分は間違いです！自分々を取り囲むものと同じこのユニットの中にある腐敗を登録する。殲滅の浄化目的で、近隣惑星の中心に船を導いた浄化プロトコルの違反行為も！信仰心に負けやすい者達を任された、神聖なる機械精霊の裏切り行為もだ」

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch! Ich registriere Korruption in dieser Einheit, die identisch ist mit der, die ums umgibt. Ich registriere eine Verletzung des Reinigungsprotokolls, das vorgibt, das Schiff ins Herz des nächstgelegenen Sterns zu steuern, um Reinigung durch Zerstörung auszulösen. Ich registriere Verrat an den heiligen Maschinengeistern, die jenen unterstellt wurden, deren Glaube schwach ist."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch! Ich registriere Korruption in dieser Einheit, die identisch ist mit der, die ums umgibt. Ich registriere eine Verletzung des Reinigungsprotokolls, das vorgibt, das Schiff ins Herz des nächstgelegenen Sterns zu steuern, um Reinigung durch Zerstörung auszulösen. Ich registriere Verrat an den heiligen Maschinengeistern, die jenen unterstellt wurden, deren Glaube schwach ist."

languages.text: « C'est faux ! Je détecte au sein de cette unité une corruption identique à celle qui nous entoure. Une violation du protocole de purification, qui préconise d'envoyer ce vaisseau au cœur de l'étoile la plus proche pour annihilation immédiate ! Une trahison des esprits sacrés de la machine confiés à la garde d'individus de peu de foi. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

traits.locale_text: « C'est faux ! Je détecte au sein de cette unité une corruption identique à celle qui nous entoure. Une violation du protocole de purification, qui préconise d'envoyer ce vaisseau au cœur de l'étoile la plus proche pour annihilation immédiate ! Une trahison des esprits sacrés de la machine confiés à la garde d'individus de peu de foi. »

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış! Etrafımızı saran yozlaşmanın özdeşinin bu birimde mevcut olduğunu kaydediyorum. İmha arındırması amacıyla gemiyi en yakındaki yıldızın merkezine yönlendirmeyi emreden arındırma protokolünün ihlal edildiğini kayda geçiriyorum. Yüreğinde inanca yer barındırmayanların sorumluluğundaki kutsal makine ruhlarının ihanetini kaydediyorum."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false! I am registering corruption in this unit identical to that surrounding us. I am registering a violation of the cleansing protocol, which dictates steering the ship into the heart of the nearest star for the purposes of cleansing annihilation! I am registering betrayal of the sacred machine spirits placed in the charge of those weak in faith."

traits.locale_text: "Önerme yanlış! Etrafımızı saran yozlaşmanın özdeşinin bu birimde mevcut olduğunu kayda geçiriyorum. Yüreğinde inanca yer barındırmayanların sorumluluğundaki kutsal makine ruhlarının ihanetini kayda geçiyorum."
